Government Tender Announcement
=====================================

### Title
Security Services for Veterans Affairs Canada in France

### Reference Number and Solicitation Number
cb-88-20196883 and 3000772315

### Tender Details
-----------------------------

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Contract Period**: July 1, 2024 to June 30, 2025 (with optional four one-year contract extensions)
* **Region of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Region of Delivery**: France
* **Contracting Entity**: Veterans Affairs Canada

### Tender Description
Veterans Affairs Canada invites tenders for the delivery of security guard services at the Canadian National Vimy Memorial and the Beaumont-Hamel Newfoundland Memorial sites in France.

The successful bidder will be responsible for providing security services to these sites, ensuring the safety and security of visitors and staff.

### Tender Status
Due to time constraints, this tender announcement has been closed.

### Contact Information
------------------------------

If you have any queries or require additional information about this tender announcement, please contact:

* **Name**: Susan O'Brien
* **Email**: [susan.obrien@veterans.gc.ca](mailto:susan.obrien@veterans.gc.ca)
* **Telephone**: (902) 314-8488
* **Address**: 191 Great George Street, Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island, C1A 4L2, Canada

### Documents

To access the tender documents, please visit: 

<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33696/3000772315---rfp---amd-001---security-services-en.pdf>
<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33696/3000772315---rfp---security-services_en.pdf>

This tender announcement was published on March 7, 2024, and the tender closing date was April 3, 2024, at 15:00:00 hours. The tender status is expired, as it has closed. If you have any additional information or clarification you need, kindly reach out to Susan O'Brien at the above-mentioned email address and telephone number. All documents can be accessed on the link mentioned above.
